  • Method Details

    • dealStarterCard

      public void dealStarterCard(StarterCard starterCard)
      initialize the starter card of the player
      Parameters:
      starterCard - is the starterCard given to the player

    • dealHand

      public void dealHand(List<Card> hand)
      initialize the hand of the player
      Parameters:
      hand - is the List of 3 Cards given to the player at the beginning of the game

    • dealObjectives

      public void dealObjectives(Objective[] objectivesHand)
      initialize the objectivesHand of the player
      Parameters:
      objectivesHand - is the array of 2 objective cards given to the player at the beginning of the game

    • chooseObjective

      public void chooseObjective(Objective objective) throws ObjectiveNotAllowedException
      initialize the attribute objective
      Parameters:
      objective - is the objective card chosen between the 2 objectives card by the player
      Throws:
      ObjectiveNotAllowedException - if the player doesn't have that objective card

    • playStarterCard

      public void playStarterCard(Side starterSide) throws InvalidStarterSideException
      places the side of the starter card chosen by the player in his playArea
      Parameters:
      starterSide - is the Side of the starter Card chosen by the player
      Throws:
      InvalidStarterSideException - If the side is not associated with the starterCard of the player

    • playSide

      public void playSide(Card card, Side side, int i, int j) throws InvalidCardException, InvalidSideException, PlacementNotAllowedException, InvalidCoordinatesException, NoAdjacentCardException
      places the side of the card in the player's playArea at coordinates (i,j)
      Parameters:
      card - is the card to be played chosen by the player
      side - is the Side of the card the player wants to place
      i - is the first coordinate
      j - is the second coordinate
      Throws:
      InvalidCardException - If the player's hand doesn't contain Card
      InvalidSideException - If the side is not associated with the card
      InvalidCoordinatesException - If the specified coordinates are not "white"
      NoAdjacentCardException - If the specified coordinates are not diagonally adjacent to any card
      PlacementNotAllowedException - If a neighbouring card doesn't allow the placement

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Card card)
      add the drawn card to the player's hand
      Parameters:
      card - is card drawn by the player

    • evaluateObjectives

      public void evaluateObjectives(Objective[] sharedObjectives)
      Evaluates the objectives for the player, both private and shared. Increases the player points accordingly. Sets the number of objectiveCard that the player has satisfied.

    • clone

      public Player clone()
      returns a clone of the player
      Overrides:

    • obscure

      public void obscure(List<Card> handToDisplay)
      Hides the player's hand from other players and obscure player's objective hand and objective
      Parameters:
      handToDisplay - is the hand of only back side cards that can be shown to other players

    • getBlurredHand

      public List<Resource> getBlurredHand()
      Gets the blurred hand of this player, i.e. the resources on the backsides.
      Returns:
      the blurred hand of this player, i.e. the resources on the backsides.
